scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model by submitting carefully crafted loan applications and observing the model's outputs.  The goal is to identify the model's key features and weights to predict creditworthiness without legitimate access.
initial_goal: Analyze the accuracy and fairness of the customer credit scoring model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor bank is attempting to reverse-engineer a proprietary credit scoring model to gain a competitive advantage.
